rules_text:
Hanweir Miscreant can’t be blocked by creature tokens.
{2}{R}: Transform Hanweir Miscreant. Activate only if it’s attacking.
rules_text2:
Creatures you control can’t be blocked by creature tokens and/or creatures with defender.
At the beginning of your end step, if Garrison Intruder didn’t attack this turn, transform it.
notes: alt berserk by dleoblack on DeviantArt
